other fields.summary or objective: Hardworking and dependable candidate successful at managing multiple priorities with a positive attitude. Values teamwork and is adaptable to different work demands. Passionate about programming and has a keen interest in developing AI products. Skilled in multiple programming languages, frameworks, and tools including Python, C#, Scala, SQL, JavaScript, Spark, Tableau. Possesses strong communication skills in a team environment and has a strong analytical mindset with problem-solving skills.
other fields.professional accomplishment:
DATA ANALYSIS:
- Used data analysis tools such as Tableau, Pandas, and Matlab Plot and used them to create Dataframes, graphs and charts, dashboards and stories for a variety of practical data sets
- Used Exploratory Data Analysis, feature engineering, and statistical principles and modeling technique through analyzing pricing trends, developing forecasting models, and conducting statistical analysis
PROBLEM SOLVING:
- Collaborated with other team members in creating a Reinforcement Learning capstone project on saving space in 3D box packing for logistic companies and showcased project’s business values and increased KPI for percentage of space packed from 70% to 75% when comparing AI’s box packing plan to those drafted by human experts
- Utilizing Large Language Model in building a platform that can help job seekers write cover letters, improve and tailor their resume, and practice for mock interview
TEAMWORK:
- Communicated with other team members in bringing together a low-level design for a new feature to be added to an ongoing project that involved near live streaming of data to data analytical sectors

- Collaborated with other team members in designing, coding, and presenting a Wildfire project using Spark and SQL and used ML to predict the occurrence of wildfires in U.S. with respect to the climate, geography, and other predicative factors.
